fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Shoot a player at night. 3 uses.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If you shoot a Townie, you cannot shoot again.
- If your target lives for any reason, the whole town will receive the message: **[PLAYER] IS tarnation IMMUNE WHAT ARE YOU tarnation IDIOTS WAITING FOR GO tarnation KILL THEM**
